title: Justtoons
author: Justtoons
content: What do you plan to do?###  if after this elections, Nigeria still remains the same, despite the change of government. Do you plan on leaving the country, do you plan on staying and manage it anyway ### if a new government is elected and then everything becomes good, do you plan on staying and enjoy the benefits of the new government, a new Nigeria.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: My plan after the election and things still as it is now, I will start make an alternative plan on how to leave the country for a green pasture in another country before I and my family will be starve to death in this country with the leaders of evil agenda, it's better for me to become a wheelbarrow pusher in another country and be alive than to be a well known business man here in Nigeria and die of hunger..And in the other way round,if after the election and the new government elected and things normalize,then what am I going to do in other countries to do again, people are running to other countries because their government is good,so when my government also good I think there's no need good to abroad because the good thing has arrived here in my country,..

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: After election and everything is not going well the way we want i don't think have nothing to do with it, because I don't know what kind of issue we have never seen before in this country so whether it is good or bad after election, if I wish I stay or I don't wish, I will moved to another place, but I prefer staying in my country to continue doing my business and how to make money and feed myself, now a days election is not means that after we vote our rights candidate we are going to enjoy, all this our politicians mouth are together, so my advice to my fellow citizens please don't fight each during election, it's a vote not a fight.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Even if an angel becomes the president of Nigeria today, one thing you should know is that everything will not just become great at once the rebuilding of the nation is a gradual process, so if a worse leader steps in today all I can do is to try as much as possible to survive till the next opportunity comes for me to select a new leader and if in the process of my survival I was opportune to leave the country to a greener pastures then I'll seize the opportunity and leave. But, if eventually a leader that has vision because president and I see that he's truly working to better the country then the only thing for me to do is to behave myself as a citizen. But we shouldn't forget that we're dealing with human mind here; everyone can change if you take Satan for example, he was once an angel.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Justtoons on February 24, 2023, 12:35:05 PMWhat do you plan to do?###  if after this elections, Nigeria still remains the same, despite the change of government. Do you plan on leaving the country, do you plan on staying and manage it anyway ### if a new government is elected and then everything becomes good, do you plan on staying and enjoy the benefits of the new government, a new Nigeria.Weda the country change or not, the slightest opportunity I get to leave the country for countries like Canada and USA then I'm not by any chance letting it slip off me and that's period.Until I see say them fix the country, then seeking safety outside of the country has remained my paramount obligation and I see no reason to remain for place wey even the least freedom of speech to fit talk wetin we see no dey assured na e expect say person like me wey get bad mouth go fit survive?I pray make the right person win make we fit see better place to make investments amen

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: To me I believe no government can make me successful, Las Las all this Politicians are there for their selfish and personal interest,To me I don leave Nigeria for God hand, any how God want do Nigeria make en do am,After this election my own is to hustle oo, look for money and always pray to God to be rich, because any day wey you start to get money,na that time your own Nigeria go better,And as I'm hustling too, if I see a chance of leaving this country, omoh I go grab am with both my legs and hands, I go japa sharp sharp,any day I leave this country, the only thing I go forget na to come back, I no go come back again

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: I don tire for Naija,as I dey here so na funds I no get,if not I prefer to go any second world country to hustle and protect the future of my children because the way I dey see things for this country, our children future no dey secured financially for here. Imagine say u no fit hustle for here become rich man get properties wey your children go inherit when u pass on. You just endanger their future and leave them hopeless with nothing, na so your generations go dey poor dey come,until person for the family break the yoke.If na foreign, government don already dey plan for the future of their unborn child so that the children go do better than them during their government in all aspect of live. Naija own na d other way round,instead them no even want you to exist, so any kind way wey them fit use oppress and punish you na e dem dey do. I no know why we get this kind mindset.Finally,if Naija better anywhere wey I dey I fit locate naija becos na my fatherland and e dey pain me say some people come think say na only them Nigeria be their fatherland by destroying it.

Dis election brng plenty mata way surround d malpractices of d election way fight result in court case bt 4 now, Inec don announce Tinubu 4 us as president elect.Nw, my mata wth dis thread way u mention b say,Why must e b dat, we go run commot as solution 2 escape d wahala of we nation? U wan run frm ur own house bcus, persn dey worry u? Na our country b dis o. We no ft leave am 4 anybodi after we don pursue d oyibo way bin dey on top us finish.Outside ft cast pass here o. Outside get opportunities bt dere own issues dey kwa. Like issues of racism! If u nevr experience am, u no go knw hw real nd hurtful e be.Na we get d nation nd we go dey, dey try until we get beta.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: The elections has come and gone according to INEC however for most young Nigerians it is only the beginning of political consciousness and the final litmus test for our justice system. Would it fail us as it has done in time past? Well time is going to tell. For now we keep hope alive.My plans is to figure out a way to earn income that will be able to cater for my needs as well as that of my family. And this income would not come from the government or from working for anyone but for working for myself. These income would not be dependent on the economy of the Nation or the appreciation order valuation of the naira. This is my plan.

Na decision for clear eyes.

Do you plan on leaving the country, do you plan on staying and manage it anyway ### if a new government is elected and then everything becomes good, do you plan on staying and enjoy the benefits of the new government, a new Nigeria.I never for once doubted the potentials of Nigeria becoming a great nation. For those that lost hope in their countries and wants to leave (japa), I wouldn’t blame them but it is better we come together and fight what is ours and make it great instead of bettering other countries.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Justtoons on February 24, 2023, 12:35:05 PMWhat do you plan to do? if after this elections, Nigeria still remains the same, despite the change of government. Do you plan on leaving the country, do you plan on staying and manage it anyway If a new government is elected and then everything becomes good, do you plan on staying and enjoy the benefits of the new government, a new Nigeria.I doubt say the country go remain the same, Buhari was the problem of Nigeria and not APC entirely. Buhari no been get any plans before him become the president of Nigeria. Asiwaju get plans, we never know if dem bad or good but him get plans and him get coordination. Asiwaju no enter seat say him wan chop money or recover his funds spend on campaigning or rigging the election. Dat man get money wey Nigeria no fit get self. So na power make am enter seat. Now wey him dun get the power him fit use am wrongly or well, we never know so make we no judge yet but just dey watch.As election dun finish, na for us to continue our hustle on hope of getting a better future for ourselves. Trusting politicians is never the well to go. Politics is a game all over the world, after the game is won na the policy wey follow dey determine if the country dey go forward or not. Obama was the choice of the people but dey experience a worst government under him than Trump which everybody despise. This wan mean say things no dey always go as we plan am. Buhari was also the choice of the people but we see how things played out. Allow politicians politic but no stop your hustle as you never know what the other party policy might do to the nation.
